definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="enchant_levels" type="Number">enchant_levels</variable><variable id="emeralds" type="MCItem">emeralds</variable><variable id="tool" type="MCItem">tool</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field><comment h="96" pinned="false" w="213">This template is used to recreate an enchanting table, using items instead of XP. It  should be called on a block with at least two inventory slots</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">The first slot contains the item to enchant</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This specific template uses emeralds, but you can replace them with any item you like</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field><comment h="96" pinned="false" w="173">The second slots contains the item that we want to spend for the enchantment (in this case, emeralds)</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="item_is_enchantable"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">If the item wasn't enchantable, we'd waste emeralds</comment><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is required to prevent issues with books</comment><value name="A"><block type="itemstack_get_count"><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Checks if the emeralds are actually there</comment><value name="a"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.EMERALD</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:enchant_levels</field><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="266">This is how many levels of XP will be used for the enchanting. Here it's 1 level per emerald, capped at 32.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MIN</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">18</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="itemstack_get_count"><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Here we enchant the tool</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="item_enchanted_with_xp"><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field></block></value><value name="levels"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:enchant_levels</field></block></value><value name="treasure"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">If this is true, enchantments such as Mending can appear on the item</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="itemstack_shrink"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We remove the emeralds</comment><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:enchant_levels</field></block></value><next><block type="block_inv_set_items"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Finally, we update the items in the slots</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:tool</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_inv_set_items"><value name="amount"><block type="itemstack_get_count"><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field></block></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:emeralds</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
